MS MCQs

    Dynamics 365 Sales

    »

    1. How does Dynamics 365 Sales help sellers to focus on selling?

      By providing real-time analytics and a unified view of relationships.

      By providing customer information from LinkedIn.

      By automating many time-consuming sales tasks.


    2. How do Dynamics 365 Sales Insights help sales organizations to build better relationships with customers?

      By automating many time-consuming sales tasks.

      By providing real-time analytics and a unified view of relationships.

      By providing customer information from LinkedIn.


    3. Microsoft Relationship Sales includes which products?

      Dynamics 365 Sales and Dynamics 365 Sales Insights.

      Dynamics 365 Sales Insights and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.

      Dynamics 365 Sales and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
